https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jMeUdxjdS9KfULrC0dA8CDoZwDl.jpg Four movies about the Brazilian spiritist medium, Chico Xavier (1910-2002): "The Medium Emmanuel" (1951), "A Light Shines in the Horizon" (1955), "Chico Xavier - From Pedro Leopoldo to Uberaba" (1983) and "The Great Spiritist Medium" (2007). Be moved by the greatness and humility of the medium of Emmanuel, And√© Luiz, Humberto de Campos and other Spirits, psychographing at the Luiz Gonzaga Spiritist Center or working as a writer at the Fazenda Modelo in Pedro Leopoldo (MG), in Brazil. Chico Xavier - From Pedro Leopoldo to Uberaba
